thread.title: lovely trip to paris with the family
thread.title_full: lovely trip to paris with the family - Review of Renaissance Paris Arc de Triomphe Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cathy C
title: lovely trip to paris with the family
text:
Our family thoroughly enjoyed our trip to Paris in no small part because of our stay at this hotel. The best thing about the place is the staff. They are warm, helpful and generous with their time and insights. The hotel is located close to many major tourist attractions. Our family will stay here again on our next trip to Paris.
Room Tip: Ask for a room with a view of the arc de triomphe. See more room tips
